analysis_notes.context: March 2024 - Bilal is actively developing a Flutter prayer tracking app. Technical conversation about state management and code architecture.
analysis_notes.key_insight: This conversation shows a DIFFERENT side of Bilal than the Procrastination conversation. Here he's deeply technical, detail-oriented, and executing (not procrastinating). The subject is spiritual technology - integrating Islamic practice with mobile development.
analysis_notes.connection_to_conv_001: Contrast with Conv 001: There he struggled with execution. Here (2024 vs 2023) he's executing a complex technical project. Did he overcome the procrastination? Or is this a domain where he naturally executes well (spiritual + tech)?
analysis_notes.question_for_later_convos: Is this prayer app mentioned in later conversations? Did it ship? Is it the same app as anything in 2025 conversations?
